time-panel.heading: Timeline
time-panel.description: - Click and drag to move, use your mouse scroll wheel to zoom, click to select a date or enter your required date in the date field on the right

settings.color-picker: Select a colour with the colour picker
settings.color-input: Or enter colour in hexadecimal format

analysis.not-wms: Analysis is currently only supported for WMS layers.
analysis.no-wcs: There is currently no record of the WCS (Web Coverage Service) URL for this layer, please specify this below as we need this to create a plot
analysis.analysis-description: To refine the data before analysis you can
analysis.draw-description: Draw a selection box on the map
analysis.upload-shape: Upload a shape file (requires all three of .shp, .shx & .dbf)
analysis.upload-csv: Upload a CSV file containing point data, including matchup data for comparison
analysis.upload-drag-drop: Alternatively you can drag and drop files straight onto the map!
analysis.select-description: Use this dropdown to select an existing polygon:
analysis.select-placeholder: You have no files yet, please add some

share-panel.instructions: Here's a link to this map. Just copy and paste anywhere.
